https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Cedrick Richardson, a college student trying to stay off of the streets and looking for employment, Dain "the gambler" (gambles for a living) and Gdog, a drug dealer who wants to make it big - each are living separate lives but they all come together when G-dog is ratted out and sent to jail. Dangers of the Tongue
